snippet: Top generals from both sides met but failed to bridge their differences in a rare discussion that followed two cross-border shooting incidents.
abstract: Top military generals from South and North Korea meet on their border but fail to narrow their differences during rare meeting that followed two cross-border shooting incidents.
lead_paragraph: Top generals from both sides met but failed to bridge their differences in a rare discussion that followed two cross-border shooting incidents.

headline.main: North and South Korea Hold High-Level Military Talks
headline.print_headline: South Korea: Generals Meet on Border
